report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Make/Model]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Location of Damage:**
- The front fender of the vehicle shows significant damage. There are visible scratches and dents along the edge of the fender, extending from the wheel well towards the headlight area.

**Type of Damage:**
- The damage appears to be a combination of scratches and dents. The scratches suggest that the paint has been compromised, while the dents indicate a deeper impact that has affected the metal structure of the fender.

**Conclusion:**
The vehicle has sustained noticeable damage to the front fender. The extent of the damage requires further assessment to determine the appropriate course of action, which may include repairs or replacement parts.

**Recommendation:**
- Inspect the rest of the vehicle for any additional damage.
- Schedule a repair estimate with a qualified auto body shop.
- Document the damage thoroughly for insurance claims purposes.

**Prepared by:**
[Your Name]  
Insurance Adjuster  
[Your Company]  
[Contact Information]
